mapper.insert: insert into installmentplan (InstallmentSerial, InstallmentCode, InstallmentType, InstallmentDes, DimensionTypeCode, DimensionParameter, CreateDate, UserId, Remark1, Remark2) values (#{installmentserial,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{installmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{installmenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{installmentdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dimensiontypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dimensionparameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update installmentplan
InstallmentCode = #{installmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
InstallmentType = #{installmenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
InstallmentDes = #{installmentdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DimensionTypeCode = #{dimensiontypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DimensionParameter = #{dimensionparameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UserId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where InstallmentSerial = #{installmentserial,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update installmentplan set InstallmentCode = #{installmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InstallmentType = #{installmenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InstallmentDes = #{installmentdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DimensionTypeCode = #{dimensiontypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DimensionParameter = #{dimensionparameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where InstallmentSerial = #{installmentserial,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from installmentplan where DimensionTypeCode like #{DimensionTypeCode} and DimensionParameter like #{DimensionParameter}
